page.title: 05RECREATION AND LESIURE
page.content: {In St.Merryn the recreation facilites {include}Public Footpaths (most of them going through fields){a riding stable at Tresallyn.A Parish Hall(Bingo & disco), Playing Field and a Football club in St.Merryn. There is a Swimming Pool,a B.M.X. track and Go Kart track at{Saint Merryn Holiday Park}. We conducted a survey and found that swimming is the most popular form of recreation. Snooker and Football where next.Gardening was the{most popular {hobby}with biking second,though the older genoration prefered Walking, Gardening,Reading and Swimming.Younger people liked Horse Riding,BMX Cycling, Swimming and watching T.V.Most people wanted the{recreation facilites improved.Suggestions included a sports hall with an indoor swimming pool and an amusement arcade with electronic games.
